item.title: Bitcoin Markets Remain Stagnant Around $570, Although Conditions Are Slowly Improving
item.description:
Bitcoin Markets Remain Stagnant Around $570, Although Conditions Are Slowly Improving

We are now in the slowest trading period of the year for both the legacy and cryptocurrency markets, which means volatility and volume should remain light until after the Labor Day weekend in the US. Bitcoin has once again flatlined around the $570 level as the summer doldrums roll on.

item.title: Bitcoin Core 0.13.0 is Released: What's New?
item.description:
Bitcoin Core 0.13.0 is Released: What's New?

Today marks the official release of Bitcoin Core 0.13.0, the thirteenth generation of Bitcoin's reference client as first launched by Satoshi Nakamoto almost eight years ago. Bitcoin Core 0.13.0 was developed by some 100 contributors over a period of about five months.

item.title: Ransomware May Threaten the Future of Bitcoin - Bitcoinist.net
item.description:
Ransomware May Threaten the Future of Bitcoin - Bitcoinist.net

Bitcoin has jumped in price again. Following a near two-week excursion down south, bitcoin has hit a detour and is now hovering at $581 as of press time. That's a near $10 rise since our previous price piece. However, the price is still down overall.

item.title: Is the NSA Baiting the Shadow Brokers with Seized Bitcoin?
item.description:
Is the NSA Baiting the Shadow Brokers with Seized Bitcoin?

According to a Also read: Alleged Silk Road Forum Operator 'Roped Into' U.S. Extradition recent post from crypto-blogger Krypt3ia, the wallet of the Shadow Brokers group who are auctioning NSA hacking tools, has been receiving the very same bitcoin that was seized from Silk Road.

item.title: Lara Attracts $1m Deposit in Just 5 Days
item.description:
Lara Attracts $1m Deposit in Just 5 Days

The automatic trust management system, which was launched with an aim to offer passive income options to customers, has gained momentum over the past few weeks. Telegram-based bot Lara has attracted over $1 million worth deposits to its Bitcoin investment project.

item.title: Bitcoin Core 0.13.0 is Released: What's New?
item.description:
Bitcoin Core 0.13.0 is Released: What's New?

Today marks the official release of Bitcoin Core 0.13.0, the thirteenth generation of Bitcoin's reference client as first launched by Satoshi Nakamoto almost eight years ago. Bitcoin Core 0.13.0 was developed by some 100 contributors over a period of about five months.

item.title: It Is Time People Understood That Bitcoin Can Better Than Fiat! - NEWSBTC
item.description:
It Is Time People Understood That Bitcoin Can Better Than Fiat! - NEWSBTC

The developments in Bitcoin technology now allows the digital currency to offer users the same experience as conventional financial services. Read more... Bitcoin has been around for over 8 years now. But the widespread popularity of this digital currency as an alternative to fiat currency dates back only to the past 2-3 years.

item.title: Beware, Facebook! Decentralised Social Network is Approaching
item.description:
Beware, Facebook! Decentralised Social Network is Approaching

Tel-Aviv based decentralized tech stack development company, Synereo has announced that it will be releasing the Alpha phase of decentralised social network in September. The company claims that this development will allow web applications to exist without centralized servers.
